summary: FRONT DRIVERS SEAT WILL NOT SLIDE ALL THE WAY BACK AFTER YOU HAVE TILTED IT FORWARD AND PUT IT BACK. IT SEEMS TO HANG AND NOT MOVE BACKWARD UNTIL YOU PLAY AROUND WITH IT. THEN THE SEAT WILL NOT LOCK IN PLACE WHEN YOU MAKE AN ADJUSTMENT, THEN YOU HAVE TO KIND OF FORCE IT INTO A LOCKED POSITION. ALSO THE SEAT RAIL HAS LOOSENESS IN IT.  IT FAILS EVERY TIME YOU MAKE A SEAT ADJUSTMENT.  *JB
